page.title: 05Our Houses in Stamford Br.
page.content: My house is located on Derwent Close and was built in the 1980s,on the Burton Fields Estate.It is semi- detached,has a kitchen,living room,two bedrooms and a bathroom.Other houses on the estate have upstairs and downstairs but mine is a bungalow. Other street names are:Battleflats Way,because it is the site of the battle of{1066}and Ox Close,because oxen used to be kept there. My house is in Fossway and was built in 1968.It has an extension built on the roof.It is semi-detached,has up and down stairs and has 8 rooms.Some houses on the estate are detached.The street names remind us that there was once a{Roman }settlement here.eg.Foss Way and Roman Avenue South. by Mandy kettlestring:Jane Winn
